title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message:
Title says it all. I have 820-00165-02 boards for doners, but a 820-00164-A came by with some water damage under the SMC. Are the 11" and 13.3" interchangeable?

Thanks!

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: hey John, thanks for the kinda answer. Do you actually know if it would or not though?

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: I think there will be a good chance, only one way to tell...

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message:
Yeah, thing is I need to give my client a potential timeframe. If I need to order more diner boards, well obviously that is going to add a few weeks time as I love in a third world country and shipping really sucks to here.
i ordered the 13.3" versions because Louis recommend it at one time, being they have all the same stuff the 11" have plus some more, but the BIOS is probably different if i had to guess. Now the SMC, I'm not too sure about. That's why I am asking if anyone has experience in this.
i am hoping Duke or Louis could chime in on this one, or someone that has tried or knows for sure.

Of course I could try and see, but therevisbother water damage around it, and I don't want to go down the rabbit hole, because the SMC I replaced also doesn't work with the board... If you get what I mean.

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: Nope SMC has different firmware revision. It will work if you just want to test it though.

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: Thanks Duke. I guess I'll be ordering a few of the 11" boards for each model too then.

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: I found this today when trying to order some of the 820-00164 boards and my normal vendor doesn't have any - and they seem to think that they are cross compatible. Opinions?

title: Will the 820-00165 smc work on the 820-00164 board?
message: No, you can check for yourself the firmware version for each macbook on the Apple EFI update list.
